headline: White House sends Kamala Harris to Europe to 'reassure' allies in Ukraine's standoff with Putin as Pentagon draws up early plan to evacuate Americans from Kiev to avoid another 'messy withdrawal' and Kabul catastrophe
author: Rob Crilly &
sentences:
Hey, just doing what she does best in the name of world peace...
FTA: Their mission would be to help coordinate an evacuation of some of the estimated 30,000 Americans in Ukraine in the event of an invasion, but would not involve flying them out of the country.

The White House on Wednesday announced that Vice President Kamala Harris will travel to Europe next week as part of an effort to deter Russian aggression against Ukraine.She will meet allies and partners at the Munich Security Conference.
At the same time it emerged that the White House has reportedly signed off on a Pentagon plan to use U.S. troops in Poland to help evacuate American citizens from Ukraine if Russia invaded.
